completedHtml:
Thank you for completing this survey!

Complete again the Animal Movements Survey to add another animal movement to the risk assessment.

To ensure an accurate risk assessment, please remember to update the Biosecurity Survey if there are any changes on your farm.

elements.name: pilot
farm_id
elements.description: Use a name that allows you to remember which farm you are referring to (e.g. "dairy_lleida_joan").

elements.name: mov_id
elements.description: Use a name that allows you to remember which movement you are referring to (e.g. "20_heifer_ireland").

elements.title: Pilot survey
elements.description: Please provide the following information for the pilot data processing. Use only lower case and underscores in the text inputs.

title.default: Were any of the cows pregnant?
title.ca: Alguna de les vaques estava prenyada?

text.es: Granja de un tratante de animales

choices.text: Peloponnese, Western Greece and the Ionian Islands

title.default: Were all animals purchased from the same farm?
title.es: ¿Se compraron todos los animales en la misma granja?
title.ca: Es van comprar tots els animals a la mateixa granja?

title.es: Plan de control de enfermedades en origen
title.ca: Pla de control de malalties en origen

description.default: TB -Tuberculosis, IBR - Infectious bovine rhinotracheitis/Bovine herpesvirus (BoHV-1), BVD - Bovine viral diarrhoea
description.es: TB -Tuberculosis, IBR - Rinotraqueítis infecciosa bovina/Herpesvirus bovino (BoHV-1), DVB - Diarrea viral bovina
description.ca: TB -Tuberculosi, IBR - Rinotraqueítis infecciosa bovina/Herpesvirus boví (BoHV-1), DVB - Diarrea viral bovina

text.es: BVD+ Plan de control (No oficialmente indemne)
text.ca: BVD+ Pla de control (No oficialment indemne)

title.ca: Van ser posats en quarantena aquests animals?

description.es: Detalles de la cuarentena especificados en la encuesta de bioseguridad
description.default: Quarantine details specified in the biosecurity survey
description.ca: Detalls de la quarantena especificats a l'enquesta de bioseguretat

title.default: Tests required before or after transport
title.es: Pruebas requeridas antes o después del transporte
title.ca: Proves requerides abans o després del transport

description.default: TB -Tuberculosis, IBR - Infectious bovine rhinotracheitis/Bovine herpesvirus (BoHV-1), BVD - Bovine viral diarrhoea
description.es: TB -Tuberculosis, IBR - Rinotraqueítis infecciosa bovina/Herpesvirus bovino (BoHV-1), DVB - Diarrea viral bovina
description.ca: TB -Tuberculosi, IBR - Rinotraqueítis infecciosa bovina/Herpesvirus boví (BoHV-1), DVB - Diarrea viral bovina

text.es: PCR para la detección de antígenos
text.ca: PCR per a la detecció d'antígens

description.default: Entries, by cattle category and origin
description.es: Entradas, por categoría de ganado y origen
description.ca: Entrades, per categoria de bestiar i origen

validators.text: Return date must be later than departure date

elements.name: pasture_name
elements.description: You can add new pastures in the biosecurity survey.

elements.name: pasture_animals_p
elements.title: What percentage of your animals do you move to this pasture?

title.default: Is the pasture shared with cattle from other farms?
title.es: ¿Se compraron todos los animales en la misma granja?
title.ca: Es van comprar tots els animals a la mateixa granja?

elements.name: pasture_cattle
elements.title: Other cattle pasturing in the same area

elements.name: pasture_cattlebull
elements.title: Do you or any of the other farms take bulls to the pasture?

elements.name: pasture_health_know
elements.title: Do you know the health status of the animals from the other farms?

title.default: Disease control plan of other farms in the same pasture
title.es: Plan de control de enfermedades en origen
title.ca: Pla de control de malalties en origen

description.default: TB -Tuberculosis, IBR - Infectious bovine rhinotracheitis/Bovine herpesvirus (BoHV-1), BVD - Bovine viral diarrhoea
description.es: TB -Tuberculosis, IBR - Rinotraqueítis infecciosa bovina/Herpesvirus bovino (BoHV-1), DVB - Diarrea viral bovina
description.ca: TB -Tuberculosi, IBR - Rinotraqueítis infecciosa bovina/Herpesvirus boví (BoHV-1), DVB - Diarrea viral bovina

text.es: BVD+ Plan de control (No oficialmente indemne)
text.ca: BVD+ Pla de control (No oficialment indemne)

title.default: Tests required before going to pasture
title.es: Pruebas requeridas antes o después del transporte
title.ca: Proves requerides abans o després del transport

description.default: TB -Tuberculosis, IBR - Infectious bovine rhinotracheitis/Bovine herpesvirus (BoHV-1), BVD - Bovine viral diarrhoea
description.es: TB -Tuberculosis, IBR - Rinotraqueítis infecciosa bovina/Herpesvirus bovino (BoHV-1), DVB - Diarrea viral bovina
description.ca: TB -Tuberculosi, IBR - Rinotraqueítis infecciosa bovina/Herpesvirus boví (BoHV-1), DVB - Diarrea viral bovina

text.es: PCR para la detección de antígenos
text.ca: PCR per a la detecció d'antígens

description.default: Entries, by cattle category and origin
description.es: Entradas, por categoría de ganado y origen
description.ca: Entrades, per categoria de bestiar i origen

elements.name: purchase_veh_name
elements.description: You can add new vehicles in the biosecurity survey

title.default: Were only the animals for this farm transported in this movement?
title.es: ¿Se transportaron en este movimiento sólo los animales para esta granja?
title.ca: Es van transportar en aquest moviment només els animals per a aquesta granja?

description.default: i.e. no animals that were going to another farm were on the same vehicle at the same time
description.es: Es decir, en el mismo movimiento no se transportaron animales que iban a otra explotación
description.ca: És a dir, en el mateix moviment no es van transportar animals que anaven a una altra explotació

title.default: Did your animals and the others come from the same farm?
title.es: ¿Sus animales y los de los demás proceden de la misma granja?
title.ca: Els animals i els dels altres procedeixen de la mateixa granja?

elements.name: pasture_to_veh_name
elements.description: You can add new vehicles in the biosecurity survey

elements.name: pasture_to_days_n
elements.title: How many days did it take to transport all the animals to the pasture?

elements.name: pasture_to_veh_days_exclusive
elements.title: Was the vehicle only used by the animals from your farm during those days?

title.default: Were only animals from your farm transported in each movement?
title.es: ¿Se transportaron en este movimiento sólo los animales para esta granja?
title.ca: Es van transportar en aquest moviment només els animals per a aquesta granja?

description.default: i.e. no animals that were going to another farm were on the same vehicle at the same time
description.es: Es decir, en el mismo movimiento no se transportaron animales que iban a otra explotación
description.ca: És a dir, en el mateix moviment no es van transportar animals que anaven a una altra explotació

title.default: Did your animals and the others go to the same pasture?
title.es: ¿Sus animales y los de los demás proceden de la misma granja?
title.ca: Els animals i els dels altres procedeixen de la mateixa granja?

elements.name: pasture_from_veh_equal_to
elements.title: Was the same as the transport to the pasture?

elements.name: pasture_from_veh_name
elements.description: You can add new vehicles in the biosecurity survey

elements.name: pasture_from_days_n
elements.title: How many days did it take to transport all the animals to the pasture?

elements.name: pasture_from_veh_days_exclusive
elements.title: Was the vehicle only used by the animals from your farm during those days?

title.default: Were only animals from your farm transported in each movement?
title.es: ¿Se transportaron en este movimiento sólo los animales para esta granja?
title.ca: Es van transportar en aquest moviment només els animals per a aquesta granja?

description.default: i.e. no animals that were going to another farm were on the same vehicle at the same time
description.es: Es decir, en el mismo movimiento no se transportaron animales que iban a otra explotación
description.ca: És a dir, en el mateix moviment no es van transportar animals que anaven a una altra explotació

title.default: Did your animals and the others go to the same pasture?
title.es: ¿Sus animales y los de los demás proceden de la misma granja?
title.ca: Els animals i els dels altres procedeixen de la mateixa granja?

elements.name: complete_comments
elements.title: Additional comments and feedback about the Demo survey
